duck: Tonal System is a hexadecimal (base 16) system of notation, arithmetic, and metrology proposed by Nystrom in 1859.
a tonal language, a classification of languages where some combination of high-low pitch has a phonemic distinction
Tonal (mythology), a concept appearing in the belief systems and traditions of Mesoamerican cultures, involving a spiritual link between a person and an animal
tonal definition: of or relating to tone, tonality, or tonicity.
tonality, a system of writing music involving the relationship of pitch to some centered key

milestones: Guitarist Les Paul dies at 94

wiki.text:
'Tonal' may refer to:

* Tonal (mythology), a concept appearing in the belief systems and
  traditions of Mesoamerican cultures, involving a spiritual link between a
  person and an animal
* a tonal language, a classification of languages where some combination of high-
  low pitch has a phonemic distinction
* tonality, a system of writing music involving the relationship of pitch to
  some centered key
* Tonal System is a hexadecimal (base 16) system of notation, arithmetic, and
  metrology proposed by Nystrom in 1859.
wiki.title: tonal
